Package be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.distributions

This package implements various pseudo-random distributions.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DiscreteDistribution This interface must be implemented by all the package's classes implementing a discrete random distribution.
MultiRandomDistribution This interface must be implemented by all the package's classes implementing a multi-variate random distribution.
RandomDistribution This interface must be implemented by all the package's classes implementing a mono-variate random distribution.
 

Class Summary
ExponentialDistribution This class implements an generator of exponentially distributed reals.
GaussianDistribution This class implements a Gaussian distribution.
GaussianMixtureDistribution This class implements a Gaussian mixture distribution.
MultiGaussianDistribution This class implements a multi-variate Gaussian distribution.
PoissonDistribution This class implements a generator of Poisson distributed numbers.
 

Package be.ac.ulg.montefiore.run.distributions Description

This package implements various pseudo-random distributions.
